info.name: Cerebellum, horizontal fissure
info.description: The horizontal fissure of the cerebellum is the largest and deepest of the cerebellar fissures.  It divides the cerebellum into upper vs. lower portions.  It has no functional significance but is a clear landmark.
info.item: /Sections/Thick, Whole Brain/Coronal/Occipital to Frontal/3 Cor: Occ to Fr
